channel.title: Eating without weapon
channel.description: i want to find out a way to eat without a weapon, it's a really anoying glitch on czar and im wondering if anyone can help.

item.title: Eating without weapon
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:5, topic:240885”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=317196.msg2517380#msg2517380 date=1225680338]

My server had this problem too. There WAS a TuT in the TuT section on how to do this. It was awhile ago, so I forget how to do it, but the TuT may still remain. I think it may be a anti-leach. Try finding something like

if (playerWeapon == -1)

This may be preventing you from eating when your unarmed

BTW, a player equipment slot equal to -1 means that it is empty.

Or the operator (<,>).
[/quote]

Or the reverse operator (>,<)[/quote]
Do you even know what you’re talking about? I just put that, their is no reverse operator for them…

Read full topic

This may be preventing you from eating when your unarmed
